traits.name: Contagion
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: {2%} chance to apply {Weakness} to another random enemy.'

traits.name: Cosmic Hex
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy is staggered: Consumes all stacks of {Weakness} on them to generate {Wild} [Aether] for each one.'

traits.name: Cursed
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {1} {Terror} to that enemy.'

traits.name: Healing Hex
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Heals the ally with the lowest health for {1}.'

traits.name: Hexing Strikes
traits.description: '{On Single-Target Attack from any ally}, if the enemy has less than [2] {Weakness}: Applies {1} {Weakness} to them.'

traits.name: Leeching Bond
traits.description: 'Whenever one or more {Regeneration} stacks are consumed on this monster: Deals a {3} {Water} damage hit to all enemies with {Weakness}.'

traits.name: Mesmerize
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {Redirect} to self.'

traits.name: Sensitivity
traits.description: '{Weakness} only reduces damage to {0} base damage, but each [Hit] against enemies with {Weakness} deals {1} more damage.'

traits.name: Synchronous Surge
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Applies {Weakness} and deals {1;3} damage of that element to each enemy.'

traits.name: Warlock Party
traits.description: '{On Support Action from any ally}: Applies {1} {Weakness} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Weakness}.'

traits.name: Endless Endurance
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self. On every {1;0} {Retaliates}: Additionally cleanses {1;1} {Corruption} from self.'

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Protector
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Redirect}, allies gain +{0;0} {Defense} and +{1;0} {Shielding}.

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Return To Aether
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Generates {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Safeguard
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than {0} {Shield}: {Shields} self equal to the difference.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: 'At the start of combat: Applies {0;1} {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: True Grit
traits.description: 'Whenever {Redirect} is applied to this monster: {Shields} self for {1}.'

traits.name: Aether Fiend
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally {purges} or {steals} [Aether]: Generates {1} additional [Aether] of the same element. Allies take {0} more damage from all [Hits].'

traits.name: Aggressive Purging
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Attacks] from allies: {Purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Controlled Burn
traits.description: 'For every Aether {purged} or {stolen} by allies: Applies {1} {Burn} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Burn}.'

traits.name: Critical Purging
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: {Purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Disruptive Prime
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Aether] {purged} or {stolen} by this monster: Applies {Power} to self.'

traits.name: Exploit
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Poise Purging
traits.description: 'Whenever this Monster {purges} or {steals} [Aether]: Breaks {1} {Poise} of the same element on all enemies.'

traits.name: Shock
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Deals a {3} {Fire}/{Wind} damage [Hit] to that enemy.'

traits.name: Split Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Wild} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Wild Damage} [Hit] and {purge} {1;1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Tormentor
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {0;1} {Terror} to that enemy and heals self for {1;1}.'

types.name: TypeWeakness
types.description: This Type focuses on Weakness stacks, which can come in clutch to prevent damage from big enemy attacks.

types.name: TypePurge
types.description: This Type focuses on purging enemy Aether, which can prevent enemy Actions and minimize the damage you take from them.

types.name: TypeTank
types.description: This Type focuses on protecting other allies and retaliating against enemies.
